 Ụdị ụfọdụ nké scintillometers, dị ka displaced-beam scintillometer, nwekwara ike ịlele ọnụ ọgụgụ dị n'ime nke refractive index fluctuations, nke bụ obere nha nke eddies na inertial subrange.

Scintillometers na-enyekwa ohere ịlele nnyefe okpomọkụ n'etiti elu ụwa na ikuku dị n'elu, nkè a na-akpọ okpomọkụ dị mmá. Inner-scale scintillometers nwekwara iké ịlele ọnụọgụ nke ike na-agbanwe agbanwe na iké na-aga n'ihu.
